content.heading: The else Statement
paragraphs: Use the else statement to specify a block of code to be executed if the condition is false.

In the example below, time (20) is greater than 18, so the condition is false. 
Because of this, we move on to the else condition and print to the screen 'Good evening'. If the time was less than 18, the program would print 'Good day'.
